text:
MyFitnessPal - www.myfitnesspal.com | Onsite in San Francisco | Full Time

MyFitnessPal, part of Under Armour Connected Fitness, helps more than 100 million people live healthier, happier lives and we’re looking for passionate people to join us! We’re currently hiring for backend and android engineers, product analytics and more.

You can learn more about our office culture here: http://tinyurl.com/pge965b

Come make a difference with us and check out our open roles here: http://www.myfitnesspal.com/jobs
